caller_intent: The caller (Corbin, an agent from Alliance Insurance) sought to verify whether a boat was added to the correct policy in Progressive's system and confirm coverage details.
resolution_steps: Jasmine confirmed the policy number provided by Corbin (31207185) and verified the boat was added to the correct policy.
Corbin requested a second check on another policy number (969995329) for Edward Wilkinson to ensure no errors.
Jasmine confirmed no additional items were added to Edward Wilkinson's policy and validated the boat coverage on the original policy.
Corbin was assured the boat was correctly added and the call concluded with mutual confirmation.
knowledge_required: Access to Progressive's policy verification system
Understanding of policy number formats and coverage details
Ability to cross-check multiple policies for accuracy
summary: Corbin, an agent from Alliance Insurance, contacted Progressive to confirm a boat was added to the correct policy. Jasmine verified the policy details, cross-checked with a second policy number, and confirmed the boat coverage was accurate. The call concluded with Corbin satisfied and the issue resolved.
